import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import './student.css' import profPic from '../assets/images/prof_pic.jpg'; import Footer from "../footer/Footer"; import validateSession from "../session/session"; // import '../../../Static website/src/themes/dark.css' function Student() { useEffect(() => { validateSession('Student'); document.getElementsByClassName('nav-item active')[0].classList.remove('active'); document.getElementById('authenticationTab').classList.add('active'); document.getElementById('authenticationTab').childNodes[0].innerText = 'Student'; }); return (
